GUIDE FOR COMMENTS

Users who have registered on www.macba.cat can add comments to web content. By doing so, they agree to abide by the rules set out below. MACBA reserves the right to review these rules whenever it deems appropriate.

Users agree not to send, upload or publish content in the comments area that:

  • - Is threatening, abusive, slanderous or infringes on the privacy of individuals;
  • – Infringes on intellectual property or any other right of individuals or entities;
  • - Falsifies or deletes authorship attributions, legal notices or proprietary or other types of designations;
  • - Fails to comply with legislation;
  • - Defends illegal activities;
  • - Contains viruses, corrupt files or other materials that may damage the MACBA website or any computer system;
  • - Contains advertising of any type.

We encourage users who believe that a published comment infringes on these rules to contact us by e-mailing webmaster@macba.cat.

By sending a comment, users accept that MACBA shall be the only content arbitrator of its website and comments section. As such, MACBA reserves the right, but not the obligation, to moderate, edit, classify or delete any content published on the website or the comments area.

By sending a comment, users agree to accept and abide by the terms and conditions set out above.
